source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    WMBblqsdkx.SECTION_CODE, 
    WMBblqsdkx.DOC_YYYYMM, 
    WMBblqsdkx.INP_TRAN_NO
FROM 
    WMBblqsdkx
JOIN 
    T_FI_GL_POST ON WMBblqsdkx.SECTION_CODE = T_FI_GL_POST.SECTION_CODE
                 AND WMBblqsdkx.DOC_YYYYMM = T_FI_GL_POST.DOC_YYYYMM
                 AND WMBblqsdkx.INP_TRAN_NO = T_FI_GL_POST.INP_TRAN_NO;
